mapper.select: select *, p10_institution.ins_name as entrustedInsName, p10_outles.outles_name as entrustedOutlesName, p10_transfer_record.status, p10_transfer_record.handover_time as handoverTime from p10_bank_loan left join p10_institution on p10_institution.ins_id=p10_bank_loan.ins_id left join p10_outles on p10_outles.outles_id=p10_bank_loan.outles_id left join p10_transfer_record ON p10_transfer_record.source_id = p10_bank_loan.bank_loan_id and transfer_type=0 where p10_bank_loan.del_flag=0 AND p10_bank_loan.bank_loan_id=#{bankLoanId} ORDER BY p10_transfer_record.create_time desc LIMIT 1
